script kscript_highlight.txt
sendmouse move -800 0
wait 200
clipboard clear
sendkeypress ctrl+c
sendkeypress esc
clipboard writefile txt.txt
clipboard clear
script kscript_highlight.txt
wait 200
sendkeypress ctrl+c
sendkeypress esc
wait 200
clipboard writefile txt2.txt
sendkey rightalt down
wait 200
sendkey tab press
wait 200
sendkey rightalt up
win focus ititle "Console2"
win show ititle "Console2"
